Subject: Decepticon Leadership
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Wildrider starts to cackle insanely, obviously this is not the time nor
place. Speedbreaker dosent looked to bothered. "Good to see you mighty
Megatron" he blurts.


Megatron smiles at Cyclonus and Scourges faith. They were the ones he was
most worried about following him. This would be easier than he thought.



Motormaster turns to Killfest, "Do what you need to" then he thinks
hesitatnly, "I'll do what I need to". Motormaster is having problems
analysing this. Plus, all he can hear is a roaring laughter. "Shut up
Wildrider" he yells, as he whirls his body around, bringing a fist into
Wildriders head, knocking his head from his shoulders. The smoking hole in
the top of the body, emits a sickening burning of circuits, and the body
falls down, as his computer mutters something about stasis lock.

He turns his attention to Megatron. "How do I know you are the real thing?"
He questions harshly. "We never brought you back to life, and Astroblast
saw your damaged body thrown from him in the year 2005. We saw you come
back as Galvatron. You cant be real" he accuses, visibly upset that his
leader, would be portrayed.


He stroms towards Scourge and Cyclonus, "Get off your knees. He's not the
real thing," He yells at them. Then turns to Megatron, and points a finger
accusingly. "How dare you mock the memory of mighty Megatron, you cant be
the real thing" he says, in rage.
